data.title: Ignite Philanthropy
data.meta_description: Ignite offers a range of competitive perks and benefits including:
data.text:
Our team members are the foundation of our success. That is why we strive to cultivate an exceptional work experience. Unlike many consulting firms, we are committed to hiring and investing in full-time employees. We know our team works hard to provide high-quality service and results for our clients, so we are committed to fostering a culture that promotes professional and personal growth, recognizes contributions, and encourages connections both in and out of the office.

Thanks to the hard work of our team, Ignite was recognized by Cincinnati Business Courier as a Fast 55 nominee and a Best Places to Work finalist in 2024. We take pride in our shared accomplishments and vibrant culture. We invite you to consider growing your career with us and becoming part of our dynamic team.

Open Positions:

Manager, Charlotte

Non-Profit Services Division

Full Time, Exempt

Ignite was founded in 2013 by former President and CEO of Charlotte’s Arts & Science Council Scott Provancher. Headquartered in Cincinnati, Ignite has growth to over 30 team members and is looking to achieve a deeper impact in the Charlotte community with a dedicated office and team in Charlotte.

The Manager is a pivotal role supporting Ignite Philanthropy’s Non-Profit Services Division and is responsible for managing fundraising for a portfolio of leading non-profits.

The Manager position is a unique opportunity to deepen your awareness and knowledge of the non-profit and philanthropic sectors while helping to make signature community projects happen. The Manager will work with non-profits of varying sizes and across a diverse range of sectors, and with some of our community’s top donors and leaders.

The Manager will have significant experience in managing multiple projects simultaneously to successfully meet project goals. The ideal candidate will possess a desire to provide the highest quality service, strategic counsel, and results to help clients make a positive impact in their community.

View the full description here.

If you don’t see the job you’re looking for, we would love to consider you for future opportunities! Please share your resume and a letter of interest answering the question: “Why is Ignite the right place for you, and how will your strengths and qualifications contribute to the team’s success?”

Meet our Team!
